"The Wandering Black Knight":
"Various kinds of enemies, including Natives,
have appeared in the Ruins of Naberius.
In addition, highly unusual weather patterns
have been noted in that area, with an
unusual reading at their center.
All ARKS are to deploy and investigate
this phenomenon immediately.
――――――――――――――――――――
During Quest: HP Restoration Penalty
Fail: Certain attack occurs"

"Your mission is to investigate
the unusual phenomenon
detected in the Ruins area!
...Though what it is, we have no idea."

"It's so dark and spooky out there...
It almost feels like you could be
attacked by ghosts or some
other ridiculous thing like that..."

"According to our initial
investigations, recovery effects
such as Resta will be inhibited
within that area. Be careful."

"...yone! ...Everyone! Can you
hear me?! Thank goodness...
We've re-established contact."

"But what could this place be?
It's planet Naberius... the Forest?
These coordinates can't be right..."

"Is something creating a dimensional
distortion? But anything powerful
enough to do that... Be careful!"
